meta.title: What did I learn this week (2021) - 19
meta.description: Weekly summarization and review of things I've learned in the second week of May 2021

pageProps.content:
1. Read a research paper about 'Authentication and Authorization in micro-services based systems: Survey of architecture patterns' while researching about xacml and OPA. The third architecture mentioned in the paper is similar to Netflix's architecture for authorization based on OPA/
  2. Learned some new html tips. Some of the tips were already aware, but some were really new to me.
  3. Found the API setu for Cowin and created a wrapper PWA around it.
  4. Learned about Couchbase concepts and did some poc with its dotnet sdk.
  5. Learned how to validate an indian pin input.
  6. Watched a video by Kunal Shah, CEO of Cred. I really liked his concept around 'delta of efficency'.
